display_name: Calculated - RDI in supine body position (>= 0% desaturation)
description: missing if sleep time in supine position is 0 or if position sensore was not working or if studies scored as sleep/wake
calculation: rdim0ps  = 60*(hrembp + hnrbp + carbp + canbp + oarbp + oanbp + marbp + manrbp)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
